verbose_text: In the present study, we demonstrated that the decrease in the expression of Bax and caspase-3 and the concurrent increase in the expression of Bcl-2 and the Bcl-2 / Bax ratio by 7 days of pre-treatment with Mat (30 mg/kg), which strongly favors the notion that Mat has anti-apoptotic activity as recently reported, occurred least in part, through the modulation of the Bcl-2 / Bax ratio and the inhibition of caspase-3 expression.
